query: site:en.wikipedia.org who directed the movie "inside out"

results.p: Inside Out ; Directed by, Pete Docter ; Screenplay by. Pete Docter; Meg LeFauve · Josh Cooley ; Story by. Pete Docter; Ronnie del Carmen ; Produced by, Jonas Rivera.
Inside Out is an American media franchise created by Pete Docter and Ronnie del Carmen. It takes place inside the mind of a girl named Riley.
